ing: 2 fluid ounces club soda, or to taste
des: "This signature cocktail combines gin, pear brandy, lemon juice, orange juice, and simple syrup. A quick shake is all you need. Then strain the cocktail into a chilled Collins glass and garnish with an orange slice. It's a refreshing signature cocktail at JBird Cocktails in New York City."
ins: Pour gin, lemon juice, orange juice, simple syrup, and brandy into a shaker. Fill the shaker with ice, cover, and shake until chilled. Strain cocktail into a Collins glassed filled with ice. Top with club soda and garnish with orange slice.
